attributes.additional_details: The UK should not be sending Foreign Aid to a country that is actively contary to our social values. Furthermore by passing this law Uganda are further breaching the human rights of LGBT people.
attributes.background: Aid should be cut as a response to the Ugandan government passing the Anti-Homosexuality Act.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635322
